content:
451 Germans imported millions of Muslims thinking they would be eager workers and save their pensions.
Most of them went on welfare and made it worse.
They destroyed 1,000 years of Germanic culture and wealth to prop up govt pension plans. The plan failed within less than 10 years. posted 6 days ago by PiratePatriotParrot 33 comments award share report block Wall Street Mav @WallStreetMav • 6d Germans imported millions of Muslims thinking they would be eager workers and save their pensions. Most of them went on welfare and made it worse. They destroyed 1,000 years of Germanic culture and wealth to prop up govt pension plans. The plan failed within less than 10 years.
33 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save ColonelKlink 23 points 6 days ago They imported them to rape and murder germans. Same as anywhere else. They know they're parasites wherever they go. permalink award report block reply NotYourMan 2 points 5 days ago Liberal fascism at work.  Replace the Germans with Muslims and start a civil war. permalink parent award report block reply tingo999 16 points 6 days ago Nope, it's called George Soros Open Society, UN 2030 Agenda and WEF Great Reset. It's about pushing Islam on the world. permalink award report block reply Marat1792 6 points 6 days ago Hate to break it to you, but soros is just a foot soldier. Germany has been the petri dish for all these plans and ideas. After WW2 germany IMMEDIATELY started to import people from turkey to rebuild. That plan soured. They tried it again. It soured again. Then they started to escalate east vs west german tension to distract from the fact that their plans got fucked. And so on and so on. Its literally the same damn Kazarian jew shit that lead to WW2 in the first place. Its the children of the same people, doing the same shit. Most of this started before soros's parents even met. Don't forget that all this tranny bs can trace its roots back to the university of frankfurt during the weimar republic. Literal kazarian jews took over and started the whole damn field/concept of gender studies. permalink parent award report block reply the-new-style 3 points 6 days ago The starting point for WW2 was the emancipation of jews in Germany in 1848 after the revolution they fomented. It's been downhill ever since. It the United Nations (UN) World Without Borders Agenda, and it working just fine. permalink award report block reply reasonablydisturbed 3 points 5 days ago How Angela Merkel has not been tried for treason for pushing this shit is beyond me. At best they should have exiled her ass to Africa so she can be amongst the animals she was so desperate to let in. permalink award report block reply Steve56775 2 points 6 days ago Same thing going on here but the Muslims haven’t arrived in force, YET! permalink award report block reply justinkayz 1 points 6 days ago You don't need Muslims to achieve their objective https://newamericangovernment.org/the-coudenhove-kalergi-plan-the-genocide-of-the-peoples-of-europe-western-spring/ permalink parent award report block reply HockeyMom4Trump 2 points 6 days ago My dad died at 70. It is a business for them. Only retarded people believe their story. permalink award report block reply Liberats 1 points 5 days ago "Germans imported millions of Muslims thinking they would be eager workers and save their pensions". Hahahaha
Ahahhahahah. A pygmy from Borneo with his brain sucked out through a straw  and his empty skull used as a piss pot, could tell you that only a grade A cunt could think that would work. We have the same cunts in the UK, France and basically the rest of Western Europe. We need to deal with these people at the same time we deal with what they let in. permalink award report block reply soupsandwich69 1 points 5 days ago but migrants get welfare as soon as they settle there.  ouch permalink award report block reply DITTOPatriot 1 points 6 days ago This is and was a concerted effort by the zionist to destroy the west. That's what the Arab Spring was about and that is why you had the mass migration. permalink award report block reply Treintrientje 1 points 5 days ago If it was anything like the Netherlands the original plan was NOT to save pensions: there were a couple of old industry bosses, mainly textile business, that decided it was probably cheaper to import slave labor instead of modernising their factories. (Steel work/cleaning services.. all the dirty jobs the 'educated' boomers did not want to do because they were all social workers and way to smart for real work) Then ofcourse the work was outsourced to China anyway and the industry equipment became obsolete (sound familiar? cause it is) and that's where the bleeding heart lefties came in. That was in the early 1980's when we had about 50.000 muslims here.  The economic right brought them in, the left kept them here. In this century it's the asylum seekers further accelerating this problem. You'd think these rich bastards would learn, but for now we're taking in the new Eastern European slaves too: succesfull Polish people work here for a couple of years and return to Poland with a wallet full hard-earned money. The losers (druggies/alcoholics) stay here and leech off the government via homeless programs and other leftist crap. The gains are always for the big factory owners and they;ll leave the problems for society to solve. Edit: just before this story begins there was also the oil crisis in the seventies when muslim countries blackmailed the EEG (now known as the EU) into taking in more of these muslims invaders and promoting their culture. Bath Ye'or  wrote a very detailed book on it. permalink award report block reply CleanUpPhillyTrump24 1 points 5 days ago So time to ship them home starting with anyone convicted of criminal charges of any kind, anyone that is on any Gov gibs/handouts.
